Current_folder_address: 401012-Shop E09, L2, Westfield Penrith, 585 High Street, Penrith
Email_Content:
From: Rebecca Zhou <zhouwenting6@gmail.com> 
Sent: Monday, January 16, 2023 11:54 AM
To: felix@pcen.com.au
Subject: Fwd: Penrith Shop E9 Little Amigos

FYI
---------- 转发的邮件 ---------
发件人： Ravin Chand <RChand@scentregroup.com>
日期：2023年1月16日 周一10:23
主题：Penrith Shop E9 Little Amigos
收件人：Rebecca Zhou <zhouwenting6@gmail.com>
抄送：david.huxiaoming@live.cn <david.huxiaoming@live.cn>, David Hu <david@littleamigos.com>, Basil Genimahaliotis <BGenimah@scentregroup.com>, Eileen Simons <ESimons@scentregroup.com>, Con Stavropoulos <CStavropoulos@scentregroup.com>
 
Hi Rebecca
 
Thanks for meeting us last week and as discussed we confirm as follows:
 
Demolition & Site Handover Condition
Existing shop E09 area to be de-fitted to red-book standard
Floor – Existing raised floor/ramp to be removed and existing timber/terrazzo floor finish at lower height to be retained through-out the new tenancy layout.
Floor – When the raised floor is removed and if required lessor to top floor for a consistent level – with existing floor finish retained.
Existing Ceiling -  existing mall ceiling to be retained for use by Amigos any rectification to be part of shopfitter works.
Existing ceiling @ shopfront – Lessor to cut/demolish ceiling to allow for shopfront installation – future ceiling rectification by shopfitter post shopfront installation.
Ceiling services – Remove all existing mall lighting – makegood ceiling by Amigos shopfitter
Shopfront – Proposed 1400mm high blockwork wall – to be confirmed post structural review 17/01/23.
 
Fire Services
1.       Lower level mall ceiling fire sprinklers to be capped off and alterations to suit design to be part of  Cat 1 works (lessor works @ lessee cost- works in conjunction with shopfitter program).
2.       Advise from Atul is that the existing make-up louvres may not be required post future model – to be confirmed post final design submission from Amigos
3.       PCA & FEP to provide scope for base fire services compliance
 
Mechanical Services
1.       Existing mall air-conditioning to be retained as is condition and alterations/modification to suit Amigos design layout to be part of Cat 1 works (lessor works @ lessee cost- works in conjunction with shopfitter program)
2.       Existing kitchen exhaust services is sufficient for Amigos requirement
3.       Lessor D&C to make provision for toilet exhaust – power supply terminated back to the shop EDB
 
Hydraulics Services
1.       Existing trade waste - alterations/modification to suit Amigos design layout to be part of Cat 1 works (lessor works @ Lessee cost- works in conjunction with shopfitter program)
2.       Existing Gas supply is adequate for Amigos requirement
3.       Lessor D&C to make provision for sewer connection to the proposed amenities location – all other alterations to services to be part of Cat 1 works (lessor works @ lessee cost- works in conjunction with shopfitter program)
 
Power supply
1.       Existing 3 phase 100Amps supply is sufficient for Amigos requirement
 
Base Building Structure
1.       Advise from Amigos is that no requirement to upgrade of the existing base building structure to allow for the proposed high level equipment installation – please confirm
 
We look forward to working with you and your teams. Please provide your comments as per above so we can finalise the scope/cost and if you have any further queries please call me.
 
Regards
 
Ravin Chand
Senior Retail Delivery Coord
Retail Design & Delivery

M +61412261988
E RChand@Scentregroup.com
W scentregroup.com

Deliverables.Item: Full set of mechanical drawings in PDF format

Extent.Item: Review of all drawings relevant to the car park design.
Creation of a three-dimensional model for the car park suitable for the CFD simulations.
CFD ventilation simulations to assess the performance of the proposed design. This will provide a basis on which to compare subsequent designs.
CFD ventilation simulations for up to three design changes. This includes altering natural ventilation openings, supply/exhaust flow rates, re-locating jet fans, etc.
Preparation of a Technical Report detailing the results and recommendations.

Clarifications.Item: We have allowed 3 off model simulation/modification, if additional simulations are required (for example, in the event of still unacceptable CO levels) then these will be discussed with the client and will be subject to a variation.
We have not allowed fire engineering solution for jet fan which might affect sprinkler performance, this will need to be addressed by fire engineer on the job.

Exit signs and Emergency egress lighting as per AS1680

Extent.Item: Supply and install 2 off general exhaust system from the ventilation of cool room condenser and ice maker, including ductwork, roof goose neck, supports and fittings.
Supply and install kitchen makeup air system from facade louvre to the kitchen as shown on drawings, including kitchen makeup air fan, ductwork, flexible duct, all supports and fittings.
Supply and install 1 off Dakin split cassette unit, model FCA100 (10.0 kW cooling capacity).
Supply and install refrigeration piping, wire and control to the unit.
Supply and install 2 off kitchen exhaust hoods, kitchen exhaust ductwork from the connection of the hood to connection point under the roof as shown on drawings, including all supports and fittings.
Supply and install kitchen makeup air system from connection point under the roof as shown on drawings to kitchen, including, ductwork, flexible duct, all supports and fittings.
Supply and install toilet exhaust system from connection point under the roof as shown on drawings to toilet, including toilet exhaust fan, ductwork, flexible duct, all supports and fittings.
Supply and install 15 off 4-way blow supply air grille to suite the current layout from base building AC supply air duct, including all grilles, thermostats, control panels, dampers as required.
Balancing, testing and commissioning to all the system installed as per the above.
12 month defect liability period.
supply, install 15 off 4-way blow supply air grille to suite the current layout from base building AC supply air duct, including all grilles, thermostats, control panels, dampers as required.
Balancing, testing and commissioning to all the system installed as per the above.
12 month defect liability period.

Clarifications.Item: Provision of all external louvers.
Provision of access panels to roof and ceilings where required for mechanical equipment.
Mechanical plant platforms, walkways, restraint, and the like for safe access to services mechanical plant and equipment.
Painting of any exposed mechanical services with exception of standard paint finishes on equipment.
Three phase power supply, we have assumed tails are to be provided adjacent to MSSB by the electrical contractor.
Provision of tundishes for condensate from air conditioning units(we have assumed tundishes are within 3 metres of the units).
Fire trip wiring, FFCP and associated works.
Under flashing of penetrations through roof and external walls by others.

Deliverables.Item: Kitchen exhaust air fan 3300L/s@350Pa, Fantech Model PUD564DD or equivalent
Outside air fan 360L/s@240Pa, Fantech or equivalent
Daikin VRV 4S system, CU 22.4kW cooling, 2 off FCUs are 11.2kW cooling each
Misting Box for kitchen exhaust hood 1, 2000L/S, AOM Misting Box 800 or equivalent
